roleset.name: characteristic of another time

role.descr: entity/action with characteristics of another time

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7.

example.name: arg1
example.text: The stagnant argument of sticking to the beaten track and be self - complacent , the conservative claim of maintaining the status quo , the metaphysics of either this or that , = all these are forces of convention that can not meet the needs of the times . All these are anachronistic and ossified .
